text: And no problem for the CV! It's my pleasure. I know how hard it is to get noticed when you have "no experience". Having said that you really do have a lot of experience to demonstrate already - you've nailed it and shows you make realyl good use of your time.

From reading CVs from job applications and then meeting them in person I know that people are often much better in person / have so much more to offer than their CV portrays....its just about marketing yourself well! I think this new CV of yours is brilliant now :smiley: I only did some wordsmithing...you did all the hard word getting the experience to put on it!
I don't have time right now but I will look at your CV later (hopefully by end of the week)
looks like you've filled in those red bits and added some more thoughts which is great. Will let you know what I think asap! Have a lovely rest of the week girl!
